snippet: Explore games for your smartphone where skulls and skeletons drive the action, and scream, or smile, as apps apply gory special effects to your face.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights Halloween phone apps and games.
lead_paragraph: Explore games for your smartphone where skulls and skeletons drive the action, and scream, or smile, as apps apply gory special effects to your face.

headline.print_headline: Halloween Phone Fun, With Haunted Games and Zombie Selfies
headline.main: Halloween Phone Fun, With Haunted Games and Zombie Selfies
